level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner shall promulgate rules and regulations to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 31-3255.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-96
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-96, see notes following ยง 31-3251.
